item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [DE/BHS/GRA/WAW/SBG][Databases] - API maintenance
item.description:
Jan 19, 15:46 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 19, 14:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 19, 09:33 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jan 17, 19:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/01/2022 14:00 UTC
End time : 19/01/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Write operations on the API (e.g. create a new user, change a password, create a new cluster, etc.) will be temporarily disabled (~15mn for each region).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade a component of our internal control plane

item.title: [GRA][Public cloud] - S3 OpenIO
item.description:
Jan 19, 15:31 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/01/2023 09:00 UTC
End Time : Start time : 19/01/2023 14:30 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 19, 10:47 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 19, 10:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/01/2023 09:00UTC
Service impact : Some customers may observe 503 on GET or PUT, followed by an inconsistent listing.
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it.
